sections.title: Function

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This section does not include or reference any diagrams, so the requirement for a standard diagram format is not applicable.
Since there is no use of diagrams in this section, there is no need for discussing expansions to standardized formatting.

sections.meta_notes: The section effectively describes the functions of the ADCYAP1 gene and its encoded peptide PACAP without the need for diagrams or visual aids.
